QuestData.Title: Profit Mastery: Chasheen
QuestData.Description: I am totally on to another great scam!$b$bWhen I was flying overhead I saw a really ancient tigress prowling about.$b$bDo you know how much her blood would go for on the black market? Not to mention if I convince some warlocks it adds extra potency to their summoning spells or something.$b$bIf you bring me back some of her blood I will cut you in on the scam. She was prowling about on the far side of the Dojani River from here.
QuestData.CompletionText: I thought about taking that tiger on myself but to be honest I like living...
QuestData.RewardText: Impressive! Can you smell the money? Here's your end.
